entry.title: Wednesday: Wet flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers beginning this afternoon then changing to wet flurries at times heavy later this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate.
